text: To characterize the human <extra_id_0> elk-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter , we mapped the transcriptional start site and isolated <extra_id_0> elk-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - specific genomic phage clones that contained extensive upstream and downstream sequences .
A TATA-like motif was identified immediately upstream of the transcriptional start site .
